Title: US federal judge blocks Biden Administration’s pause on LNG export permits
Description: President Joe Biden's administration’s pause on LNG export permit issuance has suffered a fresh setback after a US federal judge blocked the Department of Energy from continuing to pause the approval.
Author: JS

Title: India’s LNG imports climb to a 44-month high in June; US overtakes Qatar as top supplier
Description: LNG imports into India surged to their highest level in June since October 2020, driven by a heatwave that escalated power requirements in the country and contributed to the incremental demand for spot LNG cargoes.
Author: CK
